keywords.indexterm: Editing WSDL Documentscomposing web service calls with WSDL SOAP analyzer

body.p: After you edit and validate your Web service descriptor against a mix of the XML Schemas for WSDL and SOAP, it is easy to check if the defined SOAP messages are accepted by the remote Web Services server by using the integrated WSDL SOAP Analyzer tool (available from the toolbar or ToolsWSDL menu).
